intranet_content.title: Employee Handbook
intranet_content.description: Comprehensive guide covering company policies, procedures, code of conduct, and employee benefits. Essential reading for all new hires and a reference guide for existing employees on workplace rules and expectations.

intranet_content.title: Salesforce CRM
intranet_content.description: Customer relationship management system for tracking leads, opportunities, and customer interactions. Primary tool for sales team to manage pipeline, forecast revenue, and maintain customer contact information.

intranet_content.title: Product Catalog 2024
intranet_content.description: Complete listing of all current products with specifications, pricing tiers, and SKU numbers. Includes product images, nutritional information, and packaging details for the entire portfolio.

intranet_content.title: New Hire Onboarding Checklist
intranet_content.description: Step-by-step guide for first 90 days including required training, system access requests, and key meetings. Helps new employees navigate their initial period and ensures all administrative tasks are completed.

intranet_content.title: Microsoft Teams
intranet_content.description: Primary communication and collaboration platform for instant messaging, video calls, and file sharing. Used for daily team communication, virtual meetings, and project collaboration across departments.

intranet_content.title: Brand Guidelines Manual
intranet_content.description: Official brand standards including logo usage, color palettes, typography, and tone of voice. Essential reference for creating marketing materials and ensuring consistent brand representation across all channels.

intranet_content.title: Quality Control Procedures

intranet_content.title: Sales Training Academy

intranet_content.title: IT Service Desk

intranet_content.title: Safety Data Sheets Database

intranet_content.description: Official brand standards including logo usage, color palettes, typography, and tone of voice. Essential reference for creating marketing materials and ensuring consistent brand representation across all channels.

intranet_content.title: Expense Reimbursement Portal
intranet_content.description: Online system for submitting expense reports, uploading receipts, and tracking reimbursement status. Includes guidelines on allowable expenses, per diem rates, and approval workflows for business travel.

intranet_content.title: Quality Control Procedures
intranet_content.description: Detailed protocols for product testing, sampling procedures, and quality standards compliance. Contains SOPs for laboratory testing, batch release criteria, and deviation management processes.

intranet_content.title: Workday HR System
intranet_content.description: Self-service portal for managing personal information, viewing pay stubs, and requesting time off. Employees can update contact details, enroll in benefits, and complete performance reviews.

intranet_content.title: Sales Training Academy
intranet_content.description: Comprehensive training program covering product knowledge, selling techniques, and customer engagement strategies. Includes video modules, role-playing exercises, and certification programs for sales excellence.

intranet_content.title: IT Service Desk
intranet_content.description: Portal for submitting IT support tickets, requesting new equipment, and accessing self-help resources. Provides status updates on technical issues and knowledge base articles for common problems.

intranet_content.title: Trade Promotion Management System
intranet_content.description: Platform for planning, executing, and analyzing promotional campaigns with retail partners. Tracks promotional spending, calculates ROI, and manages trade fund allocations across accounts.

intranet_content.title: Safety Data Sheets Database
intranet_content.description: Repository of safety data sheets for all raw materials and finished products. Contains hazard information, handling procedures, and emergency response guidelines for chemical substances.

intranet_content.title: Tableau Analytics Dashboard
intranet_content.description: Business intelligence platform with real-time dashboards for sales performance, market share, and operational metrics. Provides interactive visualizations and automated reporting for data-driven decision making.

intranet_content.title: Packaging Specifications Database
intranet_content.description: Technical specifications for all packaging materials including dimensions, materials, and printing requirements. Used by procurement and suppliers to ensure packaging meets quality and sustainability standards.

intranet_content.title: Performance Review Portal
intranet_content.description: System for conducting annual and mid-year performance evaluations, setting goals, and tracking development plans. Facilitates 360-degree feedback and succession planning discussions.

intranet_content.title: Regulatory Compliance Library
intranet_content.description: Collection of regulatory requirements, FDA guidelines, and industry standards applicable to products. Includes labeling regulations, health claims guidance, and international trade compliance documents.

intranet_content.title: SharePoint Document Management
intranet_content.description: Corporate document repository for storing, sharing, and collaborating on files across teams. Provides version control, access permissions, and integration with Microsoft Office applications.

intranet_content.title: Travel Booking System
intranet_content.description: Portal for booking business travel including flights, hotels, and rental cars within policy guidelines. Integrated with expense system and provides travel approval workflows for cost control.

intranet_content.title: Product Development Stage Gate Process
intranet_content.description: Framework for new product development from concept to launch with defined milestones and approval gates. Outlines criteria for project progression, resource allocation, and go/no-go decisions.

intranet_content.title: Vendor Management Portal
intranet_content.description: System for vendor registration, qualification, and performance evaluation. Maintains approved vendor lists, tracks certifications, and manages supplier scorecards for quality and delivery.

intranet_content.title: Emergency Response Procedures
intranet_content.description: Critical procedures for various emergency scenarios including evacuation, severe weather, and security threats. Contains emergency contact numbers, assembly points, and crisis communication protocols.

intranet_content.title: Marketing Asset Library
intranet_content.description: Digital asset management system containing logos, product images, videos, and marketing templates. Enables quick access to approved creative assets with usage rights and brand compliance.

intranet_content.title: Benefits Enrollment Guide
intranet_content.description: Comprehensive overview of health insurance options, retirement plans, and voluntary benefits. Includes comparison charts, enrollment deadlines, and frequently asked questions about coverage.

intranet_content.title: Jira Project Management
intranet_content.description: Agile project management tool for tracking tasks, bugs, and project progress. Used primarily by IT and digital teams for sprint planning, backlog management, and workflow automation.

intranet_content.title: Supply Chain Dashboard
intranet_content.description: Real-time visibility into inventory levels, order fulfillment rates, and logistics performance. Tracks key metrics including fill rates, on-time delivery, and warehouse capacity utilization.

intranet_content.title: Code of Ethics
intranet_content.description: Company's ethical guidelines covering conflicts of interest, anti-corruption, and business conduct standards. Required annual certification for all employees with examples and decision-making framework.

intranet_content.title: Learning Management System
intranet_content.description: Platform for accessing online training courses, tracking certifications, and managing professional development. Includes mandatory compliance training, skill development programs, and leadership curricula.

intranet_content.title: Retail Execution Guidelines
intranet_content.description: Standards for in-store merchandising, shelf placement, and promotional displays. Provides planograms, compliance checklists, and best practices for maximizing retail presence.

intranet_content.title: Budget Planning Templates
intranet_content.description: Excel templates and guidelines for annual budget preparation and quarterly forecasting. Includes instructions for cost center planning, headcount projections, and capital expenditure requests.

intranet_content.title: Slack Messaging Platform
intranet_content.description: Alternative instant messaging platform for quick team communication and informal collaboration. Used for project channels, quick questions, and integrations with other business applications.

intranet_content.title: Manufacturing SOPs
intranet_content.description: Standard operating procedures for all production lines including equipment operation and cleaning protocols. Details step-by-step processes for ensuring product quality and operational efficiency.

intranet_content.title: Competitive Intelligence Reports
intranet_content.description: Monthly analysis of competitor activities, market trends, and industry developments. Provides insights on pricing strategies, new product launches, and market share dynamics.

intranet_content.title: Patent and Trademark Database
intranet_content.description: Repository of company-owned intellectual property including patents, trademarks, and trade secrets. Contains filing dates, territories covered, and renewal deadlines for IP portfolio management.

intranet_content.title: Customer Service Knowledge Base
intranet_content.description: Comprehensive FAQ database and response templates for handling customer inquiries and complaints. Includes product information, troubleshooting guides, and escalation procedures.

intranet_content.title: Sustainability Reporting Framework
intranet_content.description: Guidelines for measuring and reporting environmental impact, carbon footprint, and sustainability initiatives. Includes data collection templates and GRI reporting standards compliance.

intranet_content.title: Oracle Cloud Financials
intranet_content.description: Cloud-based financial management system for general ledger, accounts payable, and financial reporting. Handles month-end close processes, journal entries, and statutory reporting requirements.

intranet_content.title: Field Sales Reporting App
intranet_content.description: Mobile application for capturing store visits, competitive observations, and merchandising compliance. Enables real-time data collection and photo documentation from retail locations.

intranet_content.title: Crisis Communication Plan
intranet_content.description: Protocol for managing public relations during product recalls, accidents, or reputation issues. Contains stakeholder contact lists, message templates, and media response guidelines.

intranet_content.title: R&D Lab Notebook System
intranet_content.description: Electronic lab notebook for documenting experiments, formulations, and research findings. Provides secure, time-stamped records for intellectual property protection and regulatory compliance.

intranet_content.title: Warehouse Management System
intranet_content.description: System for managing inventory movement, pick-pack operations, and shipping processes. Optimizes warehouse layout, tracks lot numbers, and manages FIFO/FEFO requirements.

intranet_content.title: Employee Recognition Platform
intranet_content.description: Portal for peer-to-peer recognition, service awards, and performance acknowledgments. Enables employees to send kudos, redeem points for rewards, and celebrate team achievements.

intranet_content.title: Contract Management System
intranet_content.description: Repository for storing, tracking, and managing all business contracts and agreements. Provides alerts for renewal dates, tracks obligations, and maintains audit trails for compliance.

intranet_content.title: Production Planning Schedule
intranet_content.description: Master production schedule showing planned manufacturing runs, changeovers, and maintenance windows. Updated weekly to coordinate raw material procurement and finished goods availability.

intranet_content.title: Social Media Guidelines
intranet_content.description: Policy for employee social media use including personal and professional accounts. Covers appropriate content, confidentiality requirements, and brand representation guidelines.

intranet_content.title: PowerBI Reports Portal
intranet_content.description: Self-service analytics platform with automated reports and custom dashboard creation capabilities. Connects to multiple data sources for cross-functional performance monitoring and trending.

intranet_content.title: Nutrition Labeling Guide
intranet_content.description: Requirements and procedures for creating compliant nutrition facts panels and ingredient declarations. Includes calculation methods, rounding rules, and allergen labeling requirements.

intranet_content.title: Capital Expenditure Request Form
intranet_content.description: Online form for requesting capital investments in equipment, facilities, or technology. Includes ROI calculation tools, approval workflows, and project tracking capabilities.

intranet_content.title: Zoom Video Conferencing
intranet_content.description: Video conferencing platform for virtual meetings, webinars, and remote collaboration. Supports screen sharing, recording capabilities, and integration with calendar systems.

intranet_content.title: Trade Show Planning Guide
intranet_content.description: Comprehensive checklist and timeline for planning trade show participation. Covers booth design, logistics, lead capture strategies, and post-show follow-up procedures.

intranet_content.title: HACCP Documentation
intranet_content.description: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points plans for all production facilities. Details critical control points, monitoring procedures, and corrective action protocols for food safety.

intranet_content.title: Recruiting & Onboarding System
intranet_content.description: Applicant tracking and onboarding system for managing the entire employee lifecycle from job posting to new hire paperwork. Integrates with HRIS and payroll systems.

intranet_content.title: Waste Reduction Initiative
intranet_content.description: Programs and guidelines for reducing waste in operations and offices. Includes recycling procedures, composting programs, and zero waste goals.

intranet_content.title: Supply Chain Risk Assessment
intranet_content.description: Tool for identifying and assessing supply chain risks including supplier financial health and geographic concentration. Develops mitigation strategies for critical suppliers.

intranet_content.title: Annual Operating Plan
intranet_content.description: Company's annual strategic priorities, financial targets, and key initiatives. Provides a roadmap for the organization and a basis for performance management.
